div.head: HOUSE OF COMMONS
Friday, June 26, 1903
div.p:
The SPEAKER took the Chair at Three
o'clock.

div.head:
PROVINCIAL AUTONOMY FOR THE
NORTH-WEST TERRITORIES.
div.p:
The PRIME MINISTER (Rt. Hon. Sir
Wilfrid Laurier). I beg to lay you on the Table
of the House a return to an address of the
House of Commons, dated the 11th of May,
for documents relating to the granting of
provincial autonomy to the North-west Ter
ritories. I believe this is a preliminary re
port, and that there are other papers com
ing.
